channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I am resentful’: My husband’s kids didn’t show up for his heart surgery, but he’s leaving them his life insurance. Do I speak up?
item.description: “Both of us were widowed. We are in our late 60s and retired.”

item.title: These 20 stocks are strong choices for momentum investors
item.description: “Big mo” is an “eternal feature” of financial markets worldwide.

item.title: ‘People are often unreasonable when money is involved’: My husband, 62, gave me a 5-year life estate. Would I have to pay for a new roof?
item.description: “He has included a provision stating that I would be responsible for ‘maintenance and expenses’ during my occupancy.”

item.title: This momentum fund has dodged U.S. stocks and trounced the competition
item.description: A momentum strategy can be especially useful for investors looking outside the U.S.

item.title: How to plan for the end of your life if you don’t have kids or a spouse
item.description: Here are the vital estate-planning moves solo agers and people without children need to take.

item.title: The Vegas Sphere parent is gaining momentum. BTIG says buy the stock
item.description: BTIG's $110 price target implies that shares of Sphere Entertainment could rally 18% from here.

item.title: Raymond James upgrades this ‘Magnificent Seven’ titan as AI-driven growth accelerates
item.description: Raymond James' new price target upside of more than 20%.

item.title: JPMorgan sees big gains for two stocks in a unique industry: water dredging
item.description: JPMorgan initiated research coverage of Orion Group and Great Lakes Dredge & Dock with overweight ratings.

item.title: Danish pension fund to sell $100 million in Treasurys, citing 'poor' U.S. government finances
item.description: AkademikerPension's move comes amid increasing tensions between Denmark and the U.S. over Greenland.

item.title: Jefferies says to buy the dip in Meta, reiterates stock as top pick
